description: A tender vanilla cake that uses sour cream in both batter and frosting for amazing moisture and flavor.
ingredients: [{"name": "plain flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 1.5}, {"name": "baking powder", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "caster sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.75}, {"name": "salt", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "vegetable oil", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "large egg", "units": null, "amount": 1}, {"name": "sour cream", "units": "cups", "amount": 1}, {"name": "butter", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 3}, {"name": "sour cream for frosting", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.25}]
instructions: Step 01: Heat oven to 350Â°F. Line 8-inch cake pan. Step 02: Combine flour, baking powder, sugar and salt. Step 03: Blend oil, vanilla, egg and sour cream. Step 04: Mix wet into dry ingredients until just combined. Step 05: Pour into pan, bake 35-40 minutes. Step 06: Beat butter, add sugar and sour cream until smooth.
notes: Batter will be very thick. Use room temperature ingredients.
